  • City: TULSA
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the TULR location a spill agent was presented a fiberboard box that contained twelve aerosol cans UN1950. There were no DG markings or paperwork required for transportation on the outer fiberboard box. The shipment is being held at the location for the FAA.
